alert.note: Alert for Thomas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 4:11PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Thomas and southwestern Colquitt Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 411 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ochlocknee, or 11 miles southeast of Pelham, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Moultrie, Ochlocknee, Pavo, Coolidge, Riverside, Autreyville, Enon, Center Hill, South Moultrie, Merrillville, Chastain, Dawesville, Moultrie Municipal A/P, Quality, Pasco and Murphy. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
